payload.name: differential-testing-continuous-red-teaming
payload.title: Differential testing + continuous red-teaming: find regressions and exploit paths
payload.formal: compare behaviors across implementations/versions; adversarial suites probe weak spots.
payload.apm2_mapping: red-team the tool protocol, policy engine, and gate semantics continuously. Differentially test canonicalization, hashing, schema validation, and replay determinism. These are the parts attackers target because they define truth.
